alert.note: Alert for Callahan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 7:35PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Callahan County through 815 PM CDT... At 735 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorms from Clyde to Rowden to Oplin, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baird, Rowden, Oplin and Admiral. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 308 and 318. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
